solution_line_template: For the short stack orders, Hank needs to make {pancakes_per_short_stack} x {num_customers_short_stack} = <<{pancakes_per_short_stack}*{num_customers_short_stack}={total_pancakes_short_stack}>>{total_pancakes_short_stack} pancakes.

For the big stack orders, he needs to make {pancakes_per_big_stack} x {num_customers_big_stack} = <<{pancakes_per_big_stack}*{num_customers_big_stack}={total_pancakes_big_stack}>>{total_pancakes_big_stack} pancakes.

Altogether, Hank needs to make {total_pancakes_short_stack} + {total_pancakes_big_stack} = <<{total_pancakes_short_stack}+{total_pancakes_big_stack}={total_pancakes_needed}>>{total_pancakes_needed} pancakes.
